comments.author: @ThisGuyTomTV
comments.text: I might consider making another branch of my channel and do letsplays, just for certain games. I've been doing funny moments with friends and basically each of us now have been doing our own thing and I basically have nothing much to do outside of school and work, occasionally I go out with other friends but they're busy working too. While I'll still put out funny moments, I just want to feel more active with something so a lets play of a telltale game or even this year's wwe 2k my career would fit best. A large roaming game wouldn't be the best because most of the recording would be me going from point a to point b while getting lost in between haha. I just want to be more active like I use to before. I feel confident that this could work and maybe I'll find success again with youtube because I'm still long-tailing on a video from last year.

Tiny Dancer
"Tiny Dancer" is the name given to (and used when spoken about in public or otherwise) the 1/2 erection that can be grabbed at the base and twirled around, thus becoming a "tiny dancer."
"So who wants to go play frisbee?" 
"I do, but wait until my Tiny Dancer goes away."
